# atomic-result-date-value

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                             | Type     | Default      |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------------ |
| `format`   | `format`   | Available formats: https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format                                                                                                                                                            | `string` | `'D/M/YYYY'` |
| `property` | `property` | The result property which the component should use. Will look in the Result object first and then in the Result.raw object for the fields. It is important to include the necessary fields in the ResultList component. | `string` | `'date'`     |
